note:
He/him
ACAB
Angry ancom trying to make more and varied connections.

If I followed you, it's probably because I think you have interesting things to say. If I'm not considering following you, I didn't look at your profile and I don't care.

Profile pic is Bobby from King of the Hill holding a pistol, yelling, "That's my surplus value, I don't know you!"

Banner is an AK silhouette in front of an LGBTQ+ flag, with the caption "Defend equality."

fields.name: Intro
fields.value:
Midwesterner from so-called USA. Interested in anarchy and leftism, good people, music (mostly metal), shooting, cats and reptiles, and reading. 
When I'm not at my exhausting job, I'm usually with SRA or FNB comrades.

fields.name: Note to reply guys
fields.value: Support for one idea, tactic, right or solution does not constitute endorsement for an entire system or philosophy, but thanks for the bad faith attempt.
